key.name: toggle-shortcut

key.name: animation-duration
key.description: The base animation duration in seconds.

key.name: background-color
key.description: The color of the menu backdrop.

key.name: text-color
key.description: The color of the menu text.

key.name: font
key.description: The font used in the menu.
